skateparks.name: Cole Park Skatepark
skateparks.description: Large concrete park with bowls, rails, and ledges. Ocean view, lights, and restrooms.

skateparks.name: Portland Skatepark
skateparks.description: Medium-sized park with street and transition features. Family-friendly, shaded seating.

skateparks.name: Robstown Skatepark
skateparks.description: Small but smooth park. Good for beginners. Covered picnic area nearby.
